description: Simple and compact, this mouse does the basics better.Compact meets comfort.Crafted with materials carefully selected to add aesthetics and create a touching experience for your fingertips. Enjoy ergonomics that fit to your palm like a glove - just slightly smaller.2.4G wireless ease.Plug in the plug-and-play nano receiver and instantly create a robust 2.4G wireless connection. Relieve yourself from cable chaos, and enjoy the look and feel of cordless freedom.No-brainer DPI control.Change the selected sensitivity (1000, 1500 and 2000 DPI) at the press of a button. Saving you the hassle of clicking around the control panel or mouse driver. Whether you're gaming, graphic designing, or just surfing the web, it's a total no-brainer benefit.Get to know us.We created Anker with a single goal in mind: to make the smart life easier. That means starting with affordable, high-quality gear and ending with a commitment to 100% user satisfaction and an 18-month warranty. After all, we're customers too.
title: Anker® 2.4G Portable Wireless Mouse, 3 DPI Levels (1000/1500/2000)
